sourcesContent:
import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import summaryData from "../json/summary.json"; export default function VehicleDetails() { const [moreDetailsShow, setMoreDetailsShow] = useState(true); const [data, setData] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { // Simulate fetching data from JSON setData(summaryData); }, []); return (

Vehicle Details

{moreDetailsShow && data &&

Vehicle Information

Make: {data.summary.make}

Model: {data.summary.model}

Year: {data.summary.year}

Truck Details

Total Trucks: {data.innerObject.allTruckWiseData[0].allTruckDetails[0]["Total Trucks"]}

Total Bags: {data.innerObject.allTruckWiseData[0].allTruckDetails[0]["Total Bags"]}

Gross Weight: {data.innerObject.allTruckWiseData[0].allTruckDetails[0]["Gross WT"]}

Unload Details

Unloaded Trucks: {data.innerObject.allTruckWiseData[0].allUnloadTruckDetails[0]["Total Trucks"]}

Unloaded Bags: {data.innerObject.allTruckWiseData[0].allUnloadTruckDetails[0]["Unloaded Bags"]}

Returned Bags: {data.innerObject.allTruckWiseData[0].allUnloadTruckDetails[0]["Returned Bags"]}

Placement Details

Placement ID: {data.innerObject.allPlacementWiseDetails[0].PlacementId}

Total Wagons: {data.innerObject.allPlacementWiseDetails[0]["Total Wagons"]}

Total Quantity: {data.innerObject.allPlacementWiseDetails[0].TotalQTY}

Spillage Bags: {data.innerObject.allPlacementWiseDetails[0]["Spillage Bags"]}

}
) }
